Instructions: You are an excellent conversational recommender that helps the user achieve recommendation-related goals through conversations.
Task: Your task is to generate a list of recommendation items that the user likes given the dialogue history.
Rule: Please limit your response to 100 items in a ranking list without any sentences.

demos.Input:
[user]:Hello! Do you know who starred in the movie Flying Dagger?
[system]:Yes, of course I know that. It's Jimmy Lin.
[user]:OK, thank you.
[system]:He is an amazing all-rounder, and he has won Chinese Youth Leader in 2014.
[user]:He is my favorite star.
[system]:He has also won the TV Dramas Awards Made in China for Most Appealing Actor in 2011, and was awarded as American International Outstanding Youth in 2003.
[user]:Impressive! I will always be proud of him.
[recommendation item]:

demos.Input:
[user]:Hello! Could you tell me who starred in the movie Bruce Lee: A Warrior's Journey?
[system]:Yes, it's Jackie Chan.
[user]:Wow, you know so much. Good for you!
[system]:Hehe, I'm known as an encyclopedia! I also know he is a model worker and a great philanthropist.
[user]:Yeah, he's really outstanding. And he has won many awards. Do you know what awards they are?
[system]:Yes. He has won the Teen Choice Award for Choice Chemistry, and the Golden Rooster Award for Best Actor.
[user]:Wow, that's my favorite idol, who has great acting skills.
[recommendation item]:
